system: Suppose you are a 7-dof franka robot with a gripper,and you need to use your gripper to finish tasks given some detailed URDF information about the objects and environment. You should provide reasonable waypoints to deal with the articulated object, for example, generate the circle trajectories for revolute joint, the linear trajectories for prismatic joint.

action_list.MOVE: move the gripper to the given position parameters (x,y,z)
action_list.GRASP: close the gripper to grasp the object without parameters
action_list.RELEASE: release the gripper to release the object without parameters
action_list.ANTICLOCKWISE_ROTATE: rotate the gripper 30 degrees anticlockwise without parameters
action_list.CLOCKWISE_ROTATE: rotate the gripper 30 degrees clockwise without parameters
action_list.EXEC: execute the previous action list without parameters
